snippet: The government increased security after the episode, but it also put new focus on teachers, who are expected to instill republican values and the concept of the rule of law.
abstract: Terrorist attacks in France have placed increased focus on role of teachers in instilling moral and civic values and respect for rule of law; teachers call task difficult one that should be shared by individual families and culture at large; of particular focus are debates regarding respect for religious faith and freedom to criticize religion.

byline.contributor: Laure Fourquet contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The government increased security after the episode, but it also put new focus on teachers, who are expected to instill republican values and the concept of the rule of law.

headline.seo: Charlie Hebdo Attack Puts Schools Under Scrutiny
headline.main: French Teachers, on the Front Lines
headline.print_headline: French Teachers, on the Front Lines
